title: Triggered
description: Taken by the group of demons that killed her father, twenty year old Ava is tortured, starved, and brought to the edge of death. She knew nothing of this supernatural world but suddenly the years of military level training her father put her through make sense.  Rescued by a team of hunters and on the run from the demons that want another taste of her soul, Ava learns more of the world she has been thrust into. Her only hope of survival is to find the demon prince and destroy him. How hard could taking down the immortal prince of demons really be?  Emotionally captivating, Triggered will make your heart bleed while adding a twist of humor and hot desire. It's not everyday that four sexy supernatural hunters come to your aid.  **This is a reverse harem novel. This book contains scenes of abuse and a character experiencing PTSD**
author: Aly Westman
